Initializer# init(image:options:)

iOS 16.0+iPadOS 16.0+Mac Catalyst 16.0+macOS 13.0+tvOS 16.0+visionOS 1.0+**iOS, iPadOS, Mac Catalyst, tvOS, visionOS**



```
init?(
    image: UIImage,
    options: [PDFPage.ImageInitializationOption : Any] = [:]
)
```

**macOS**



```
init?(
    image: NSImage,
    options: [PDFPage.ImageInitializationOption : Any] = [:]
)
```
